name: Divinity Knight
description:
Divinity Knight

A world plagued by evil, and one Knight determined.........To see how far you can get before you get sent back, or fall off the map! Our game is an endless runner, with a goal to see how far you can last, in one run.

Controls 

Up Arrow key - Jump

Right Arrow Key - Dash

Idea Behind the Game

We set off on a endless runner, because in our eyes it was a fun and fast idea for a game to do in our Gaming Development Class. Endless runner's have had a good influence in games for a long time, and a positive effect in the gaming community for a while. We worked hard to get the game to where it is today.
